goal.en: "This course introduces the outline and foundation of materials science and engineering materials, covering atomic bonding and coordination, crystalline structure, crystalline defects, mechanical properties, strengthening mechanisms, material fracture, phase diagrams, phase tranformation, metal heat treatment and forming, ceramic materials, polymers and composite materials, material electrical properties, thermal properties, material magnetism, dielectric and optical materials, material degradation and corrosion, etc."
goal.ch: 本課程介紹材料科學與工程材料的概要與基礎，內容涵蓋原子鍵結及配位，結晶構造，結晶固體之缺陷，機械性質，差排與強化機制，材料破裂，相圖，相轉變與微結構之改變，金屬熱處理與成形，陶瓷材料，高分子及複合材料，材料電性，熱性質，材料磁性，介電及光學材料，材料之劣化與腐蝕等
